lookInProjectPaths.title: Search files in opened project
lookInProjectPaths.description: Search files using the project as root before using the specified path

pathForFileSearching.title: Path(s) for looking up requested files
pathForFileSearching.description: Insert one or more paths (delimited by ';') that are going to be checked when searching for a file

optionalExtensions.title: Extensions that are optional in filenames
optionalExtensions.description: Insert zero or more extensions (delimited by ';') that are optional in declarations
